title: Love Begins with Fate
description: Fate has a strange way of making things work. Kelsey's parents are divorced. She and her twin brother were seperated. Now, half way through her senior year her mother and father have convinced her to go live with her brother and father for the rest of her senior year. Her best friend Hannah, begs her friend to go out for a night of fun before she starts her first day at the new school. Giving in to her friend's whims for the first time in her life, she becomes someone she's not. Too drunk and too full of life, Kelsey does the unthinkable and dances for a guy. She didn't remember what happened at first but now .... she just hopes he can forget about her....But boy was she wrong.
author: Lindsey Owens
